transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Ji sir aawaz aa rahi thi kat gayi thi sir aawaz. 
Executive: [unintelligible] bola tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan woh Vinay ka phone aa gaya tha.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha Vinay sir ka na baat nahi karna sir.
Customer: Haan uska department change ho gaya tha.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Uska department change ho gaya hai Vinay ka.
Executive: Haan woh unka change ho gaya but koi dikkat nahi hai unka woh toh matlab senior position pe hai na sir, theek hai. Toh unka department change ho gaya hai but yahan se aapka jo account manager hai woh same hi hai sir jo service dekh raha tha aapka, theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh aap mujhe bataiye kya issue hai sir main usko resolve kara ke dunga jo bhi issue hai aapka kuch agar issue aa raha hai toh. 
Customer: Jab jab renewal liya na tab mera baat hua tha woh Vinay ke sath ki yeh jo hafte ka bylead hai monthly bylead hai woh unke sath extra 100 bylead diya jayega. Kitna?
Executive: Okay. Toh 100, 100 matlab jo non lapsible bylead ka bola hua 100 bylead ka hai na sir.
Customer: Haan jab aapke paas woh consume ho jaye toh uske baad jo aapke achcha lead aayega toh woh main bhej dunga toh mera ek saal toh ho gaya hai renewal ke liye toh kabhi main woh use nahi kiya hai toh abhi mere ko zarurat hai toh aap provide karna padega na aapko.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Toh woh abhi. 
Executive: Okay okay. Ek kaam karna sir dekhiye isme na mujhe bahut saari cheezein aur bhi discuss karni hai jaise aap agar jaise aap keh rahe hai lead wagera aur saari. 
Customer: Kuch kaam nahi hai discuss mere ko karna hi nahi hai lekin yeh sab denge toh aage baat karenge.
Executive: Dekhiye na lead ka main baat kar leta hu aapko team sir ne inhone hi promise kara hoga na yeh agar Vinay ne ya Pragati ne jo account manager aapki thi na sir unhone hi toh jo hoga aapko bylead ka promise Vinay sir ne ya fir Pragati ne hi promise kiya hoga na renewal ke time pe sir woh main dekh lunga main karwa dunga. Theek hai agar aapka hai bola gaya hai aapko toh woh cheez milegi sir aapko aisa nahi hoga ki aapko bola gaya toh hum usko nahi denge aapko agar aapko unhone 50 lead solid jo bhi bola hai theek hai. Magar mujhe ek baar check karna padega inse ki kya kitna lead ka aapko promise kiya gaya tha woh main kara dunga sir aapko. Aapka yeh renewal hua tha isme TrustSeal ka woh hua tha main bata deta hu aapka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapne March mein liya tha na sir March mein TrustSeal mein 2025 mein sir. TrustSeal na sir.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan boliye.
Executive: Main yeh keh raha hu sir aapne March mein hi toh liya tha TrustSeal aapne jo yeh start karaya tha aapne March mein hi toh liya tha sir.
Customer: Haan March mein liya.
Executive: March mein liya tha tabhi aapko bola gaya tha ki lead aapko 100 extra milengi sir ya fir uske beech mein kahi bola hai unhone matlab aapki team ne.
Customer: Nahi jab renewal kiya tabhi bola tha.
Executive: Tabhi bola tha na aur tab us. 
Customer: Aapko ek minute rukiye tab aapko kuch nahi mila tha ek minute main March ka dekh hi leta hu kitna kya kuch humein allocate hua tha kya non lapsible lead dete hai na hum log woh ek minute main dekh leta hu ek minute rukiye.

Executive: Rahul ne karaya tha na yeh sir aapka?


Executive: March mein okay renewal aapka hua TrustSeal two year ka.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Ek minute rukiye sir.

Executive: Okay us time pe I think yahan pe nahi hua hai allocate sir aapko lead jo bhi aapko agar bola gaya tha. 3 March se aapka start hua tha yeh dobara se February month hone ke baad.
Customer: Are bhai invoice dekhna aage kitne tab hua tha 3 March 2 March kar raha hai.
Executive: Matlab haan matlab aapka start hua tha matlab dobara se start hua tha woh aapka kyunki February mein aapka tha na renewal sir. Fir aapne February mein pay kiya tha toh uske baad March mein start dobara hua tha ek minute rukiye main bata deta hu.
Customer: February mein start hua hai 27 February.
Executive: 27 ko TrustSeal two year aapka. Woh sab chodna bhai jab start hua woh mera extra wala bylead hai na woh mere ko bhej baat khatam ho jayega.
Executive: Nahi haan bas sir wohi main dekh raha hu usi ke liye main aapka kara dunga aur main wohi check kar raha tha ki us time pe aapko jo milta hai na hum dete hai deti hai theek hai main ek baar dekh leta hu. 
Customer: Mere ko bola tha ki aapko push kar hum dalenge aise mat dalenge fir aap log woh ghuma fira ke Mahabharat aata hai woh nahi chalega.
Executive: Nahi nahi theek hai main samajh gaya sir woh aap ghuma nahi raha hu main bas bol raha hu bola hai toh aapko milega main yeh bol raha hu 50 ka bola hai 100 ka jo bhi bola hai unko main bas woh dekh raha hu kis jo tha jisne karaya main ek baar usse discuss karke abhi jaisa bhi hoga approval daal ke aapka karwaunga usme sir jaisa bhi rahega theek hai toh 50 jaisa bhi rahega main ek baar discuss kar leta hu aapke jo bhi jis time pe renewal karaya tha Vinay sir se baat kar leta hu. 
Customer: Mere samne discuss karo uske sath.
Executive: Kiske sath?
Customer: Mere samne discuss karo uske sath main bhi sunu woh kya bolta hai.
Executive: Hmm. Sir woh main aapko bata dunga thodi der mein discuss karke aur woh ho jayega aapka resolve dekhiye main yeh nahi keh raha nahi milega sir aapko. Bola gaya hai toh milega sir. 
Customer: Mere ko fatafat bana ke bhejo.
Executive: Haan theek hai theek hai sir main baat karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants 100 extra buyleads promised during renewal.

- Customer says he never received promised buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive will check the promised leads.

- Executive will discuss with the concerned team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the customer after discussion.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, renewal, trustseal, promise
